thread.title: Great Stay!
thread.title_full: Great Stay! - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Marchely H
title: Great Stay!
text: This hotel is simply exquisite. Your staff was very friendly and helpful, I mentioned we were traveling for my fiance's birthday and a few minutes after we were settled in our room a beautiful dessert plate was sent. The remodeled rooms are clean and very spacious; we had an amazing view of the London Eye right outside of our room window! I will definitely recommend this hotel to all my friends and family traveling to London. Thank you for the fabulous stay!
